values.text: I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
Hello...hope you are having a good day. How may I help you?

Here are the different OTT platforms: 
1.Amazon Prime
2.Netflix 
3.Disney+ Hotstar
Hello @user_name, how may i help you?

please select an OTT in which you want movie recommendations

1.Provide information about various OTT platforms.
2.Recommend movies, shows from various OTT platforms based on your interests. 
3.I can provide you with the list of top movies for various genres that are available on various OTT's .
Hello, I am the OTT recommend engine, I can help you with choosing an OTT platform and with movie recommendations for various genres.

Pleasure talking to you,hope I have solved your queries .
Bye...See you again

Disney+ Hotstar is an online video streaming platform owned by Novi Digital Entertainment Private Limited, a wholly owned subsidiary of Star India Private Limited. Disney+ Hotstar currently offers over 100,000 hours of TV content and movies across 9 languages, and every major sport covered live. Highly evolved video streaming technology and a high attention to quality of experience across devices and platforms, make Disney+ Hotstar the most complete video destination for Over The Top (OTT) video consumers.

Amazon Prime is a paid subscription service that gives Amazon shoppers a variety of perks. Amazon Prime Video is one of the biggest perks of being an Amazon Prime member. Prime Video offers unlimited streaming of movies and TV episodes. Another advantage, however, is free one- or two-day shipping on most items sold by Amazon. During Amazon's Q1 2021 earnings call, the company revealed it has over 200 million paid Prime members worldwide.

Netflix Rs 199 Mobile plan
This is the most basic Netflix plan and is priced at Rs 199 per month. While the plan offers unrestricted access to the whole catalogue of Netflix, there are a few restrictions in place. For starters, the plan can be used to watch content only on mobile devices which includes smartphones and tablets. Moreover, users can stream content only in Standard Definition (SD) resolution and only on one screen at a time. Users will have to pay Rs 2,388 for this Netflix yearly plan.

Netflix Rs 299 Mobile+ plan
The Netflix Rs 299 Mobile+ plan is being tested by Netflix India in the country and is available only to a select few users. The plan is priced at Rs 299 and offers the same benefits as the basic Mobile plan. However, users who subscribe to this plan will be able to stream content in HD resolution instead of SD.

Netflix Rs 499 Basic plan
Next up is the Netflix Basic plan priced at Rs 499 per month. For a premium of Rs 300, users will be able to stream content on laptop and TV too, apart from mobile devices. However, other conditions remain the same as the mobile plan including SD resolution, and 1 screen allowed at a time. In case you want to purchase Netflix yearly subscription for this particular plan, you’ll have to pay Rs 5,988.

Netflix Rs 649 Standard plan
The Netflix Standard plan is priced at Rs 649 per month and it bumps the number of screens allowed for concurrent viewing to two. Additionally, the Netflix Standard plan also lets users enjoy their favourite shows and movies in High Definition (HD) resolution. Users who subscribe to this plan can enjoy streaming on smartphones, tablets, laptops, and TVs. The Netflix annual subscription for this plan costs Rs 7,788.

Netflix Rs 799 Premium plan
This is the most premium of all Netflix plans in India priced at Rs 999 per month and Rs 9,588 for a year.  Users will be able to stream on smartphones, tablets, laptops, and TVs using this plan. Additionally, the account comes with support for four screens, which means four users can stream from the same id at the same time. Lastly, the Rs 799 Netflix subscription in India allows users to enjoy streaming in 4K resolution.

Netflix is a subscription-based streaming service that allows our members to watch TV shows and movies without commercials on an internet-connected device.   

You can also download TV shows and movies to your iOS, Android, or Windows 10 device and watch without an internet connection.

Netflix is a subscription-based streaming service that allows our members to watch TV shows and movies without commercials on an internet-connected device.   

You can also download TV shows and movies to your iOS, Android, or Windows 10 device and watch without an internet connection.

Disney Plus Hotstar comes in two tiers – Premium and VIP. The Premium plan can be subscribed in both monthly and annual plans, and are priced at Rs 299 per month or Rs 1,499 per year. The lower tier subscription plan, Hotstar VIP, is priced at Rs 399 per year
